--- # Talks I actively attend events to gain and share my knowledge. If you have an event / talk / panel which I can be a part of in any way (to üó£ or üëÇ or both), feel free to reach out at aditya@ketkar.me {{< rawhtml >}}
{{< /rawhtml >}} ### Frontend Patterns for Lightning Performance @ Microsoft, March 2021 A live and interactive deep dive into frontend-performance optimization with patterns like CSR, SPAs, SSR, SSG, ISG etc. A comparative study of technologies behind Amazon, Gmail, Netflix along with some quick wins for perf improvements [Slides (pdf) ‚Üó](https://drive.google.com/file/d/13yhcpI_CwCU0np_tzTAUJGNci4hSGme3/view?usp=sharing) | [Slides with videos (pptx) ‚Üó](https://drive.google.com/file/d/19J08czyywp7JCioK8eDQ2Li83zW3bc3C/view?usp=sharing) {{< rawhtml >}}
{{< /rawhtml >}} ### Resume Draftimg 101 @ [EdMad](https://edmad.io), July 2020 Zero to hero in drafting and maintaining a killer resume, all in 30 mins. A talk for final and pre-final year students and people looking to up their resume game [Slides ‚Üó](https://drive.google.com/file/d/19vIO2utgN8zpioxbrRW8TtXIiHBBBTbk/view?usp=sharing)

/private/ideal-blog.content:
- Generate static pages
- Generates graph
- Internal linking, fast af
- Page previews on hover
- Backlinks

- Use willpower to break down and plan. Use expertise to execute.
